description: The AWS::GameLift::MatchmakingRuleSet resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) matchmaking rule set.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A unique identifier for the matchmaking rule set.
Name.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the matchmaking rule set.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: Replacement

RuleSetBody.description: A collection of matchmaking rules, formatted as a JSON string.
RuleSetBody.markdownDescription:
A collection of matchmaking rules, formatted as a JSON string.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 65535  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: A time stamp indicating when this data object was created. Format is a number expressed in Unix time as milliseconds.
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
A time stamp indicating when this data object was created. Format is a number expressed in Unix time as milliseconds.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift matchmaking rule set resource and uniquely identifies it.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift matchmaking rule set resource and uniquely identifies it.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:.*:matchmakingruleset\/[a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: No interruption
